response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. I understand that the true worth of this product might be subjective, but based on its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than what the market typically offers. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am offering the product at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your potential to benefit from its unique features. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you need further information to make a decision.", "product_price": 15000}
